summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of WealthX crypto investment consulting platform. Successfully tested all 23 required features including landing page sections, admin panel CRUD operations, market page functionality, and backend APIs. All critical functionality working correctly with 100% frontend success and 93.3% backend success rate.

minor_bugs.issue: Initial request without x-admin-password header returns 401, but works correctly when header is provided
minor_bugs.impact: No functional impact - authentication working as designed

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section showing 'Your Crypto, My Expertise. Up to 40% Returns.'
Investment examples section displays 6 cards with correct amounts (5K→7K, 10K→14K, 20K→28K, 50K→70K, 1L→1.4L, 5L→7L)
Schemes section successfully loads 4 investment plans from backend API
WhyTrustUs section displays all 6 trust indicator cards
Testimonials section shows 6 Indian testimonials with investment/return amounts
Contact section displays WhatsApp links to correct number +91 7080682448
FAQ section contains 6 questions with working accordion expand/collapse functionality
Admin page shows password login form
Admin login with correct password 'Newral@123' grants access to scheme management dashboard
Admin login with wrong password displays error and blocks access
Admin dashboard displays all 4 existing schemes after successful login
Admin can create new scheme via form with all required fields
Admin can edit existing schemes through form interface
Admin logout functionality works correctly
Market page loads successfully with crypto data integration
Market page displays global stats cards (Total Market Cap, 24h Volume, BTC Dominance, Active Cryptos)
Market page shows trending coins section with 10 trending cryptocurrencies
Market page displays top cryptocurrencies table with 20 coin rows and complete data
Market page refresh button works with proper loading states
Navigation between all pages works correctly (landing, market, admin)
Newsletter subscription form in footer works with backend integration and email validation
Backend API GET /api/schemes returns complete schemes list (200 status)
Backend API POST /api/admin/login validates password correctly (200/401 status)
Backend API POST /api/admin/schemes creates scheme with correct authentication header (200 status)
Backend API PUT /api/admin/schemes/{id} updates existing schemes (200 status)
Backend API DELETE /api/admin/schemes/{id} deletes schemes (200 status)
Backend crypto market APIs working (top-coins, trending, global stats)
Backend newsletter subscription API with email validation working
Frontend-backend integration verified through live API data loading
All WhatsApp links throughout site correctly configured to +91 7080682448
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design and UI interactions working correctly
